Name: Merrimack Pharmaceuticals, Inc
Description: Merrimack Pharmaceuticals, Inc. operates as a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company that targets biomarker-defined cancers. The company is developing MM-310, an antibody-directed nanotherapeutic, which is in Phase I clinical trial to treat patients with solid tumors. Its preclinical product candidates include MM-401, an agonistic antibody targeting a novel immuno-oncology target; and MM-201, a stabilized agonist-Fc fusion protein targeting death receptors 4 and 5. The company has a collaboration and license agreement with Ipsen S.A. Merrimack Pharmaceuticals, Inc. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Address: One Broadway, Cambridge, MA, United States, 02142
